title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 90.4 - Small game
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 90.4 - Small game

State Regulations
(a) No person
shall hunt gray squirrels, cottontail rabbits, raccoons, foxes and unprotected
mammals in the area except between the third Sunday in December and the last
day of February. (b) No person
shall hunt ruffed grouse in the area. (c) No person shall hunt in the area in the
areas designated by signs as closed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
90.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
